description: I am Harish Kumar, Software engineer - Frontend at Freshworks. I have good amount of experience in building and debugging web applications.

experience.description: Currently still working on l4s and may implement some features probably
Been working on L4s in the product along with others. Got a chance to compete with Engineers across Freshworks and got Promoted to Software Engineer by winning it
Worked on Revamping entire Freshchat's UI. I also wrote Unit and Integration test cases. I learnt how to improve code coverage and TDD

projects.name: Tetris
projects.description:
Tetris is a javascript package bundled with webpack and written in react
Singular component that can generate a website with minimaleffort. Contains multiple ui components that can be grouped together in numerous combinations.

projects.name: Readme Components
projects.description:
Dynamically generated components for markdown files
An API written in Javascript for generating numerous components that can be used in markdown files

projects.name: WEFMS
projects.description:
WEFMS stands for Wireless Engine Fuel Monitoring System. The motive of this project is to maintain the generators that are located remotely.
Turn on or Turn off the generators from any where around the world using the Web-App.

projects.name: KLN Vidyalaya
projects.description:
KLN Vidyalaya is an school present at Madurai.
The website for that insititute is responsive and is updated frequently. It has a large variety of UI elements such as carousel, timelines and many more.
